TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BinaryMessageFormatter extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable, class System.Messaging.IMessageFormatter
Public Class BinaryMessageFormatter Implements ICloneable, IMessageFormatter
public ref class BinaryMessageFormatter : ICloneable, System::Messaging::IMessageFormatter

summary.span: 使用二進位格式將訊息佇列訊息的主體序列化或還原序列化物件，或連接物件的整個圖解。

span.span: Serializes or deserializes an object, or an entire graph of connected objects, to or from the body of a Message Queuing message, using a binary format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非常有效率，而且可用來序列化大部分的物件。The is very efficient and can be used to serialize most objects. 結果是相當精簡且快速剖析的但並不允許鬆散偶合的傳訊為沒有。The result is very compact and fast to parse, but does not allow for loosely coupled messaging as the does. 鬆散偶合的方式，用戶端和伺服器可以獨立版本傳送和接收的類型。Loosely coupled means that the client and the server can independently version the type that is sent and received. 當應用程式會傳送訊息至佇列使用的執行個體類別，格式器會將物件序列化成資料流，並將它插入訊息內文。When the application sends a message to the queue using an instance of the class, the formatter serializes the object into a stream and inserts it into the message body. 讀取佇列使用時，格式子還原序列化成訊息資料屬性。When reading from a queue using a , the formatter deserializes the message data into the property of a . 提供更快速的輸送量比。 provides faster throughput than the . 使用當純速度而不是鬆散偶合的傳訊想要使用。Use the when pure speed rather than loosely coupled messaging is desired. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，而不指定型別樣式或最上層物件組件樣式。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class without specifying a type style or top object assembly style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須指定的值屬性 （會定義在圖形中的根物件的配置方式） 和屬性 （會定義物件的類型描述的配置方式） 使用的執行個體之前類別序列化並傳送訊息。You must specify values for the property (which defines how the root object in a graph is laid out) and the property (which defines how object type descriptions are laid out) before using an instance of the class to serialize and send a message.

summary.span: 決定格式子是否能夠還原序列化訊息的內容。

span.span: Determines whether the formatter can deserialize the contents of the message.

returns.span: 如果二進位訊息格式子可以將訊息還原序列化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the binary message formatter can deserialize the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回`false`如果訊息本文不是二進位物件。 returns `false` if the message body is not a binary object. 在接收端電腦上，傳回`true`如果要還原序列化類別的組件存在於本機。On the receiving computer, returns `true` if the assembly for the class to be deserialized exists locally. 組件必須位於全域組件快取中，或連結至應用程式 （例如，如果自訂類別所代表的物件）。The assembly must be found in the global assembly cache, or be linked to the application (for example, if the object represents a custom class).

span.span: The parameter is .

summary.span: 建立 類別的執行個體，其讀取/寫入屬性 (根物件和型別描述格式) 和目前的 相同。

span.span: Creates an instance of the class whose read/write properties (the root object and type description formats) are the same as the current .

returns.span: 物件，其屬性和這個 的屬性相同，但是其中繼資料 (Metadata) 沒有指定它為格式子類別執行個體。

span.span: An object whose properties are identical to those of this , but whose metadata does not specify it to be a formatter class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立此格式子的複本，並初始化其所有屬性的值。This method creates a copy of the formatter and initializes all its properties to the values of this . 用於擴充性，但不保證讀取或寫入執行緒安全。It is used for scalability, but does not guarantee read or write thread safety.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Read(class System.Messaging.Message message) cil managed

param.span: 要還原序列化的 ，格式為二進位格式。

span.span: The , in binary format, to deserialize.

summary.span: 讀取指定訊息的內容，並建立包含還原序列化訊息的物件。

span.span: Reads the contents from the given message and creates an object that contains the deserialized message.
The deserialized message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). 訊息的主體必須是以二進位格式，而且必須使用相同的序列化程式來還原序列化開始序列化它的訊息。The body of the message must be in binary format, and the same serializer must be used to deserialize the message as that which initially serialized it. 如果主體代表自訂類別，該類別的組件必須存在於本機。If the body represents a custom class, the assembly for that class must exist locally.

exception.span: 訊息的 屬性不是一個二進位物件。

span.span: The message's property does not indicate a binary object.
The parameter is .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，定義在尋找和載入圖形之最上層 (根) 物件的組件時還原序列化它的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that defines how the top (root) object of a graph is deserialized with regards to finding and loading its assembly.

value.span: 其中一個 值，定義還原序列化 (Deserialization) 行為。

span.span: One of the values that defines the deserialization behavior.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，您應接受預設值， `AssemblyStyle`。Currently, you should accept the default value, `AssemblyStyle`.

summary.span: 將物件序列化到訊息主體中。

span.span: Serializes an object into the body of the message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最上層物件的格式和型別格式不需要指定讀取時，它們必須是寫入至佇列。The top object format and type format need not be specified to write to the queue as they must be when reading. 和屬性時，使用格式器只能還原序列化訊息。The and properties are used by the formatter only when deserializing a message. 可以序列化大部分的物件，但不鬆散耦合的結果。The can serialize most objects, but the result is not loosely coupled. 不過，它是壓縮，因此格式器是大型物件時很有效率。However, it is compact, so the formatter is efficient for large objects.

span.span: The parameter is .
